items.name: Vegetable Spring Roll
items.description: Stuffed with cabbage, carrots, celery, and grass noodles; served with plum sauce.

items.name: Chicken Satay
items.description: chicken breast marinated with Thai herbs and spices on sticks; served with peanut sauce and cucumber salad.

items.name: Fried Calamari
items.description: Sliced fresh calamari dipped in batter sweet garlic plum sauce.

items.name: Tom Yum Soup
items.description: Spicy and sour soup with choice of meat, mushrooms, fresh lime juice, lemon grass, kaffir lime leaves, cilantro and chili paste.

items.name: Tom Kha Soup
items.description: Coconut milk soup with choice of meat, mushrooms, fresh lime juice, lemon grass, kaffir lime leaves, cilantro and chili paste.

items.name: Green Pappaya Salad
items.description: Spicy salad made from shredded unripe papayae, choice of meat and other veggies.

items.name: Pad Thai
items.description: Popular noodle dish; pan stir fried noodles with bean sprouts, onion and ground peanuts.

items.name: Drunken Noodles
items.description: Wide rice noodles with choices of meat; wok fried garlic, chili cabbage, tomatoes, carrots and basil leaves.

items.name: Thai Fried Rice
items.description: Fried rice with choice of meat, garlic, chili bamboo shoots, bell pepper.

items.name: Pineapple Fried Rice
items.description: Exotic fried rice with choice of meat, egg, tomatoes, onion, cashew nuts and pineapple.

items.name: Basil Fried Rice
items.description: Fried rice with choice of meat, garlic, chili bamboo shoots, bell pepper and Thai basil.

items.name: Red Curry
items.description: Choice of meat simmered in red curry paste, coconut milk, bamboo shoots, bell pepper and Thai basil leaves.

items.name: Green Curry
items.description: Choice of meat, simmered in green chili curry paste, coconut milk, bell pepper and basil.

items.name: Yellow Curry
items.description: Choice of meat, simmered in yellow curry paste, coconut milk, potatoes and carrots.

items.name: Panang Curry
items.description: Choice of meat simmered in thick red curry paste, coconut milk, bell pepper and lime leaves.
